thread.title_full: Visa-Vietnam.org Receives Excellent Client Reviews on Trustpilot

title: Visa-Vietnam.org Receives Excellent Client Reviews on Trustpilot
text: Visa-Vietnam.org Receives Excellent Client Reviews on Trustpilot Visa-Vietnam.org Receives Excellent Client Reviews on Trustpilot Vietnam, 21 September 2015 -- Visa-Vietnam.org is a leading online travel agent which is specialized in Visa On Arrival services. They have received excellent client review of 8.9 stars with 28 reviews on Trustpilot.Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam ( scoopasia.com ) September 21, 2015 - Visa-Vietnam.org has gained clients' trust with their prompt and easy online visa services. They have received 8.9 stars out of 10 on Trustpilot, of which 75% clients have rated them with 5 stars and only 25% with 4 stars. Most of the Visa Vietnam reviews are based on their fast and efficient services. "For many years, we are using the service of Visa-Vietnam.org. They are very fast, efficient and worth the money. The normal service is already good, but the emergency service is lightning fast," reviews a happy client. Adding to the review, the manager from Visa-Veitnam.org comments, "We are happy to receive such accolades from our clients. It shows that our dedication is worthy and customer friendly. We work hard to maintain our friendly services and offer more affordable as well as fast service. " Visa-Vietnam.org has been offering Vietnam visa services to its clients for the past 10 years 24x7. Get fast, easy, hassle free visa with no visits to embassy with Vietnam Visa online services. The Visa on Arrival services are of great demand as it is more convenient, but it is important that clients choose the right visa agent. In order to get Vietnam visa on arrival or landing visa, applicants have to fill up an online application form on Visa-Vietnam's website and pay the Visa fees and service charges through online bank transfer. Get visa approval letter through email, print a copy to show on boarding & get Visa on arrival. Finally, get the visa stamped at Vietnam airport. Visa Vietnam allows corporate members to avail 26% discount on service fees whereas, frequently members can avail 18% to 22% discount. Rush service is also available which provides visa on same day or few hours with extra fees. They guarantee 100% satisfaction to the customers or would refund the money. About Visa-Vietnam Visa-Vietnam is one of the most reputed travel agents in Vietnam who can help to easily secure a Visa on Arrival. They offer special discounts, hassle free application process, processing within 24 hours, affordable prices and easy accessibility. To know more, visit visa-vietnam.org/ CONTACT DETAILS
